channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8092] Vectorized Tez count(*) returns NULL instead of 0 when result is empty
item.description:
In tez mode when vectorization is enabled, count returns NULL when result is empty.

Expected behavior: It should return 0

count works as expected when vectorization is off
item.summary: Vectorized Tez count(*) returns NULL instead of 0 when result is empty

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
